//============================================================================
// Name        : CodeChef.cpp
// Author      : 
// Version     :
// Copyright   : Your copyright notice
// Description : Hello World in C++, Ansi-style
//============================================================================

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int pin,a,b,c,num1,num2,num3,rev,temp,final;
	while(1)
	{
		cin>>pin;
		if(pin==0)
			break;
		c = pin%10;
		pin/=10;
		b = pin%10;
		pin/=10;
		a=pin;
		num1 = a*b;
		num2= b*c;
		num3= num1+num2;
		if(num3>=100)
		{
			rev=num3%10;

			num3/=10;
			//cout<<rev<<" "<<num3<<endl;
			temp=num3%10;
			rev=rev*10+temp;
			num3/=10;
			//cout<<rev<<" "<<num3<<endl;
			temp=num3%10;
			rev=rev*10+temp;
			//cout<<rev<<" "<<num3<<endl;
			//final=num1*100000+num2*1000+rev;
		}
		else
		{
			rev=num3%10;
			num3/=10;
			temp=num3%10;
			rev=rev*10+temp;
			//final=num1*10000+num2*100+rev;
		}
		if(num1<10)
		{
			cout<<"0"<<num1;
		}
		else
			cout<<num1;
		if(num2<10)
		{
			cout<<"0"<<num2;
		}
		else
			cout<<num2;
		if(rev<10)
		{
			cout<<"0"<<rev;
		}
		else
			cout<<rev;
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
